Setup Smart & Bulk SMS
For Your Brand In Minutes

Setup automated text messaging throughout your business operations in just a few minutes, and scale without worrying about upgrades and extra costs!

Scan a QR code and instantly install the mobile app on your android device.

Upload any csv file with your

contacts and you're all set!

Formulate your message, choose a contacts
group, and schedule
your campaign.
